name: VA Casket or Urn Allowance Program
popular_name: VA Casket or Urn Allowance Program
objective: To provide a monetary allowance for the purchase of a casket or urn used to inter Veteran remains in VA national or VA-grant  -funded cemeteries when there is no next of kin or sufficient resources for a casket or urn.
applicant_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)

results.description: For FY22,  there were  323 casket reimbursements totaling  and 10 urn reimbursements.
VA processed 303 casket allowances and 19 urn allowances in FY 24.

rules_regulations: 38 CFR § 38.628 Allowance for caskets and urns for unclaimed remains of veterans.
